TopicTitle: Suggestion: fade out crew-window during flight

Articles.Content:
Hello

I'd like to have the possibility to fade out / deactivate the crew-window in the upper right corner during flight. You can do this already with the ressource-window, so maybe it's not that complicated and add an icon in the app-bar to bring it back on display. The general information presented in this window is not this important (at east for myself), so I'd like to use this space for other stuff.

Thanks for listening
Snips
